summary: This is an email chain from August 30, 2019, between a US Attorney's Office representative and an individual named MI, discussing coordination to speak about the Epstein case before contacting a victim. The email copies Assistant U.S. Attorneys (AUSAs) working on the case.

events.title: Coordination call about Epstein case
events.description: Email exchange to arrange a discussion about the Epstein case between a US Attorney's Office representative and MI, prior to MI speaking with a victim.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 30, 2019, after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
The correspondence involves the US Attorney's Office coordinating with an individual (MI) about the Epstein case.
The purpose is to speak with MI before MI contacts a victim, indicating ongoing victim outreach or investigation.
Assistant U.S. Attorneys (AUSAs) working the Epstein case are copied on the email.
The document reference EFTA00101252 suggests it is part of a larger document set related to the Epstein case.
